text: You can use your mail app on your iPhone

to block unwanted emails
from certain email addresses.

This even works with an external
connected email account,
for example, a Gmail account.
Open your mail app on your iPhone.
Navigate to an email
from the email address you want to block.
Press on the sender's name.
Press the name again
to open up the additional options menu.
Press "Block this Contact."

Confirm the block by pressing
"Block this Contact."
Click "Done."

Now you'll see a red circle
with a line through it
in the header box and a message saying,

"This message is from a
sender in your blocked list."
If the sender sends you another message
from this point further,

it will automatically
be placed into the trash
of the email account it's being sent to.
